function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adaptive governance leading to ineffective response to the pandemic","Impact":"Potential increase in cases, infection peak, and mortality rate","Mitigation":"Implement multi-level organization, legislations, governmental policies, and key leadership to enable adaptive co-management","Technologies":"Adaptive governance frameworks, communication technologies for coordination","People":"Local institutions, healthcare workers, officials, volunteers","Owner":"Government, health ministries, local governance organizations"},{"Description":"Weak social capital and lack of trust in the community","Impact":"Reduced capacity to build resilience and respond effectively to the pandemic","Mitigation":"Invest in building social capital, fostering trust, and promoting cooperation and information sharing","Technologies":"Social network analysis tools, community engagement platforms","People":"Collectives, individuals, community organizations","Owner":"Community leaders, organizations, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate decentralization of control in healthcare systems","Impact":"Potential lack of agility and adaptability in responding to localized outbreaks","Mitigation":"Empower local organizations, allocate sufficient budget, and establish representative committees for effective local control","Technologies":"Decentralized healthcare management platforms, budgeting and auditing tools","People":"Local healthcare organizations, representatives, community leaders","Owner":"Health ministries, local governance bodies"}]}
